name: Super.B.boy V1.0
description:
Iam going to fix the page later today and this is a placeholder draft.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a full game with 12 maps.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Found one of my old usb sticks and some old projects .

This game where only released before on Intels ultrabook app store.

Thats why there still is some text about touch controls ingame.

Sometime around 2010-1011?

Have now converted all code to latest version of agk so let me know of the bugs you find.

This where a weekend project for me now when i found the files again ;)
